preference.name: IMM_IMPORT_FILTERS
preference.preference_description: Defines the entries for each material import transformation in the following format ImportKey;SourceFileExtension;TranslatorInformation;DisplayName * ImportKey: The import key * SourceFileExtension: extension of the files * TranslatorInformation: valid values are CLASS:classkey for Java or DATASET:datasetName * DisplayName: Display name for the import
